_header: In the months of June and July
_description:
Alchemical verses — twenty lines (Singer (1928)
XSinger, Dorothea Waley. Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts. 3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31, 864)

BodAsh759.First Lines:
In the monthes of Iune and Iulyvnderstond be then non
                    dully…
BodAsh759.Last Lines: …which is cally anymalricher then the mynerall
